p: An interesting finding was reported by Nehme et al. [ 17] for C. mandioccana, which showed chemotypes for styrylpyrone derivatives, combined with a conserved profile of flavonoid glycosides. Few studies have focused on chemotype differences at the level of plant metabolism for different compound classes, with no prior research about other Lauraceae species. Herein, we investigated if N. megapotamica chemotypes presented the same volatile and phenolic compounds.
